Welcome to our website and home!

Nowadays Cuba promises to be like nowhere else you have ever been: economically poor, architecturally splendid, and strangely inspiring. Learn our traditions, history and lifestyle while you become one of us. Forget all preconceived ideas and enjoy what the island and its people have to offer.

Our business is part of the emerging Cuban private sector, and our staff is formed by a group of officially licensed freelance workers. We can book your accommodation, transportation and all kinds of activities, always with private suppliers. All of our services are specially designed to your interests and budget.

Once you leave Cuba, we will provide you in our website with records of your trip should you ever need it. Login to find your detailed itinerary, pictures, etc.

Accommodation

Take your first step towards a Cuban experience by staying at a “casa particular”, in Havana or anywhere else in the island. You can choose any area in Havana city, but top recommendation is Old Havana. Prices and further details are available upon request. Please contact us.

View More

Transportation

Whether you prefer classic or modern cars, we can arrange your transportation all around Cuba with professional drivers. Some of the most popular destinations are listed below. Feel free to contact us if you have any specific requests.

View More

Activities and Tours

Take your first step towards a Cuban experience by staying at a “casa particular”, in Havana or anywhere else in the island. You can choose any area in Havana city, but top recommendation is Old Havana. Prices and further details are available upon request. Please contact us.

View More

General Tours and Specialized Tours

Old Havana Walking Tour

Old Havana offers visitors one of the finest collections of constructions in the Americas. Its stunning four squares, interconnected by narrow cobble streets, depicts a time of colonial glory. Behind the buildings’ renovated facades, you will find plenty of museums, art galleries, cafes and shops. Do not miss the opportunity to get a taste of Cuba at the Chocolate Museum, or a souvenir at the Scent Museum.

Book

Old Havana Walking Tour

Old Havana offers visitors one of the finest collections of constructions in the Americas. Its stunning four squares, interconnected by narrow cobble streets, depicts a time of colonial glory. Behind the buildings’ renovated facades, you will find plenty of museums, art galleries, cafes and shops. Do not miss the opportunity to get a taste of Cuba at the Chocolate Museum, or a souvenir at the Scent Museum.
